contact-tracing.TITLE: Contact Tracing
contact-tracing.MESSAGE: For your safety and the safety of our employees please take the time to fill in our form for contact tracing due to COVID-19. Your information will be kept strictly confidential and used only for contact tracing. Thank you in helping us all stay safe.
contact-tracing.STRONG-MSG: If you do not choose to subscribe to further news or updates, your information will be automatically deleted after 30 days.

contact-tracing.VALID-PHONE: Please enter a valid phone number

contact-tracing.SUBSCRIBE: Subscribe to receive news, updates and promotions from BienMenu or any of BienMenu's partners.
contact-tracing.OPER-FAILED-MSG: Failed to register contact information at this given time...we apologize for the inconvenience.
